description: This course explains deeply driving laws, tricks and scams that can be seen on the Russian roads. It covers all parts of Russia including Saint Petersburg and Moscow. So, many things are left untold by the American and European drivers that consider these kind of driving style normal because they live in this country for quite long. I mentioned all these things because I traveled and rented a car internationally. I crossed US, Europe (Cyprus, France, UK) and some Middle East countries. In Asia I saw driving style that even more rough than in Russia. So, you will not regret and waste your money and time watching my course. It explains type of mistakes made by the drivers who come from another countries especially European and American citizens.
title: How to drive a car in Russia
